cards.title: Generate synthetic data
cards.description: Convert your real-world data into private, shareable, synthetic data.

sampleDataset.description: Use this sample electronic health records (EHR) dataset to synthesize an entirely new set of statistically equivalent records.

cards.title: Amplify data
cards.description: Create a high volume of synthetic records from real-world data or data that has already been synthesized.

cards.title: Generate natural language data
cards.description: Use GPT to create high quality free form synthetic text from single column datasets.

cards.title: Identify PII in tabular data
cards.description: Use NLP to find and label sensitive information. More than 40 entities supported.

sampleDataset.description: This public dataset of bicycle sales provides a good example of commonly found sensitive data in sales records. Use it to quickly label names, emails, social security numbers, etc.

cards.title: Redact PII in sensitive data
cards.description: Perform privacy preserving transformations on your sensitive data.

sampleDataset.description: Unstructured text datasets are useful for training chatbots or other models that need large amounts of data. The emails in this public dataset need to be de-identified before they can be used to train ML models.

cards.title: Generate differentially private synthetic data
cards.description: Achieve the highest level of safety by adding differential privacy.
